title: The magnificence of spider silk
description: Cheryl Hayashi studies spider silk, one of nature's most high-performance materials. Each species of spider can make up to 7 very different kinds of silk. How do they do it? Hayashi explains at the DNA level -- then shows us how this super-strong, super-flexible material can inspire.
author: Cheryl Hayashi
keywords: TED, talks, MacArthur grant, biomechanics, biomimicry, science, technology, materials, molecular biology, biotech, engineering, industrial design, nature, insects, web, physics
